original_text: Then the princes of the Philistines went forth: and it came to pass, after they went forth, that David behaved himself more wisely than all the servants of Saul; so that his name was much set by.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들의 방백들이 싸우러 나오면 그들이 나올 때마다 다윗이 사울의 모든 신하보다 더 지혜롭게 행하매 이에 그의 이름이 심히 귀하게 되니라

sentences.original_text: Then the princes of the Philistines went forth:
and it came to pass, after they went forth,
that David behaved himself more wisely
than all the servants of Saul;
so that his name was much set by.
